CatDescriptText: Related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 16, 1954, pg. 16, reads: 'Aida' Makes Curtain - "Aida," presented by the National Negro Opera Foundation, Inc., and its Pittsburgh Opera Guild, at Syria Mosque Saturday night overcame difficulties and answered critics of the effort by giving a commendable performance. It was a tribute to Mme. Mary Dawson, founder and organizer of the NNOF, and her associates...
TitMainTitle: Woman and man in Egyptian costumes standing in Syria Mosque for National Negro Opera Company performance of "Aida"
